# AVExperienceController.ExpandedConfiguration.Placement

**Structure**

A structure that represents where the video will be experienced.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Placement
```

## Overview

Control where an experience is placed. It can be over a UIScene.

## Placements

- **over(scene:)**: Places the video over the provided scene.
- **unspecified**: Doesn’t specify placement.

## Specifying placement

- **fallbackPlacement**: A fallback placement to use when the original container isn’t in the view controller hierarchy.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable

items.description: Places the video over the provided scene.
items.name: over(scene:)

items.description: A fallback placement to use when the original container isn’t in the view controller hierarchy.
